meta.description: Quick character summary of Roj Blake

content.p: We first meet Blake in the first episode, The Way BackWell, it is his series, after all.. He's had his memories rubbed out because he used to be a resistance hero. He takes a bit of persuading about his past.
Blake used to be a resistance leader but was caught by Travis, who sat in wait for him after receiving information that Blake planned to break some freedom fighters out of jail.
Once Blake begins to recover his memories, he proves an effective leader, who inspires loyalty in (most of) his crew. He's kind of idealistic, hugely stubborn and a bit dull.
Avon and Blake have an unusual relationship - Blake seems to greatly respect Avon's abilities and honesty. In a funny way they are friends, but Avon would never admit as much.
Blake is more openly warm to Jenna.
